title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




Hope Levin, 2nd Year Master of City Planning Student I’m taking this course because I want to grow as a student. I took GIS last year and learned a little about R, but lack true depth in the topic.




Email: hopelevi@upenn.edu
GitHub: hlevin13

title: Week 1 Notes - Course Introduction
text:
Coding Techniques

We covered the basics of adding functions.
Didn’t cover Quarto in today’s class, but did learn that you can make PowerPoints with it!

title: Week 1 Notes - Course Introduction
text:
Questions & Challenges

Setting everything up… it took some time.
I need to practice adding functions and making sure they work.

title: Week 1 Notes - Course Introduction
text:
Connections to Policy

I learned that you can use this class to analyze the housing market! Excited for that.

title: Week 1 Notes - Course Introduction
text:
Reflection

The possibilities of where this class can take me… it feels open and like I can take it anywhere.
